name: EGOLOGIC
description:
"Someone new came into the forest."
"I think he is a family member of the girl who moved out."
"He looks a bit like her."
"Which girl?"
"The one who got easily scared."
"Ah, ah,  I remember."
"Very easily scared."
"Yes."
"Yes."
"There is nothing to be afraid of."
"Yes."
"..."


This is a game made for the NaNoRenO 2020 visual novel jam.

Features
  • +1.5 hours of story/gameplay
  • choices and 3 endings (good, bad, bad bad)
Content warning
  • some swearing
  • scenes that could possibly be upsetting/uncomfortable

NOTE: Although playable, the game is still incomplete at this point. We will release an update soon to add finalised audio, branching, polish and possible bug fixes. Follow us to get notified!
